line_1: But some excising Courtier will have Toll.
line_2: Shortly no Lad shall chuck, or Lady vole,

line_1: The solemn knell of death, I heard it toll;
line_2: How heavily it struck my wounded soul!

line_1: Who longs, impatient, for the solemn Toll,
line_2: Which, slow, proclaims the sad-departed Soul;

line_1: Slow and delib'rate as the parting toll,
line_2: Some o'er the tongue the labour'd measures roll
